actions.committee: Senate Committee on Governmental Affairs (Formerly:  Post Office and Civil Service)
actions.text: Rereferred to Senate Committee on Governmental Affairs (Formerly:  Post Office and Civil Service).

official_title: A bill to deny Members of Congress any increase in pay under any law passed, or plan or recommendation received, during a Congress unless such increase is to take effect not earlier than the first day of the next Congress.

summary.text: Delays increases in the pay of Members of Congress authorized pursuant to the Legislative Reorganization Act of 1946 and the Federal Salary Act of 1967 until the first day of the Congress next after the one in which such pay increase was proposed.

titles.title: A bill to deny Members of Congress any increase in pay under any law passed, or plan or recommendation received, during a Congress unless such increase is to take effect not earlier than the first day of the next Congress.
